languages.text: {n}Надолго погрузившись в молчание, Паскаль наконец изрекает:{/n} "Ввиду высокого статуса единицы {name} фон Валанциус и {mf|его|ее} заслуг перед Адептус Механикус возможно ходатайство об... особом снисхождении к единице Джай Хейдари. Забвение без права на сервиторизацию, положенное за ее преступления, может быть смягчено до немедленной искупительной сервиторизации".

{n}After a long silence, Pasqal finally declares,{/n} "Given the high status of the unit {name} von Valancius and {mf|his|her} services rendered to the Adeptus Mechanicus, perhaps a request for... special leniency for the unit Jae Heydari. The sentence of oblivion without servitorisation that is stipulated for her crimes may instead be commuted to immediate redemptive Servitude Imperpituis."
languages.original_text: {n}Надолго погрузившись в молчание, Паскаль наконец изрекает:{/n} "Ввиду высокого статуса единицы {name} фон Валанциус и {mf|его|ее} заслуг перед Адептус Механикус возможно ходатайство об... особом снисхождении к единице Джай Хейдари. Забвение без права на сервиторизацию, положенное за ее преступления, может быть смягчено до немедленной искупительной сервиторизации".

The sentence of oblivion without servitorisation that is stipulated for her crimes may instead be commuted to immediate redemptive Servitude Imperpituis."

The sentence of oblivion without servitorisation that is stipulated for her crimes may instead be commuted to immediate redemptive Servitude Imperpituis."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tras un largo silencio, Pasqal declara por fin:{/n} «Dado el alto estatus de la unidad {name} von Valancius y los servicios que ha prestado al Adeptus Mechanicus, tal vez proceda una cierta... indulgencia especial con la unidad Jae Heydari. La condena al olvido sin servidorización que está estipulada para sus crímenes puede conmutarse por una redención mediante Servidumbre Imperpituis con carácter inmediato».
languages.original_text: {n}After a long silence, Pasqal finally declares,{/n} "Given the high status of the unit {name} von Valancius and {mf|his|her} services rendered to the Adeptus Mechanicus, perhaps a request for... special leniency for the unit Jae Heydari. The sentence of oblivion without servitorisation that is stipulated for her crimes may instead be commuted to immediate redemptive Servitude Imperpituis."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras un largo silencio, Pasqal declara por fin:{/n} «Dado el alto estatus de la unidad {name} von Valancius y los servicios que ha prestado al Adeptus Mechanicus, tal vez proceda una cierta... indulgencia especial con la unidad Jae Heydari. La condena al olvido sin servidorización que está estipulada para sus crímenes puede conmutarse por una redención mediante Servidumbre Imperpituis con carácter inmediato».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}長い沈黙の後、パスカルはやっと口を開いた。{/n}「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス部隊の地位の高さ、および帝国技術局に対する{mf|彼|彼女}の貢献を考慮すると…ジェイ・ヘイダリ部隊に対する特別措置を要請すべきかと。彼女の罪に対して定められたサーヴィター化なき忘却の刑は、代わりに即座に贖罪できる不眠奉仕の刑に減刑されるかもしれない」
languages.original_text: {n}After a long silence, Pasqal finally declares,{/n} "Given the high status of the unit {name} von Valancius and {mf|his|her} services rendered to the Adeptus Mechanicus, perhaps a request for... special leniency for the unit Jae Heydari. The sentence of oblivion without servitorisation that is stipulated for her crimes may instead be commuted to immediate redemptive Servitude Imperpituis."

traits.locale_text: {n}長い沈黙の後、パスカルはやっと口を開いた。{/n}「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス部隊の地位の高さ、および帝国技術局に対する{mf|彼|彼女}の貢献を考慮すると…ジェイ・ヘイダリ部隊に対する特別措置を要請すべきかと。彼女の罪に対して定められたサーヴィター化なき忘却の刑は、代わりに即座に贖罪できる不眠奉仕の刑に減刑されるかもしれない」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡沉默了很长一段时间之后，终于郑重地说道。{/n}“鉴于{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯这一单位的高贵地位，以及{mf|他|她}为机械修会所做出的贡献，这份礼物或许可以是……对婕伊·海达利特别进行宽大处理。原定对她的罪行实施不受机仆改造、即刻湮灭的刑罚，可以改为立即执行救赎性奴役仪典改造。”
languages.original_text: {n}After a long silence, Pasqal finally declares,{/n} "Given the high status of the unit {name} von Valancius and {mf|his|her} services rendered to the Adeptus Mechanicus, perhaps a request for... special leniency for the unit Jae Heydari. The sentence of oblivion without servitorisation that is stipulated for her crimes may instead be commuted to immediate redemptive Servitude Imperpituis."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡沉默了很长一段时间之后，终于郑重地说道。{/n}“鉴于{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯这一单位的高贵地位，以及{mf|他|她}为机械修会所做出的贡献，这份礼物或许可以是……对婕伊·海达利特别进行宽大处理。原定对她的罪行实施不受奴工改造、即刻湮灭的刑罚，可以改为立即执行救赎性奴役仪典改造。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Après un long silence, Pasqal déclare enfin :{/n} « Considérant le rang élevé de l'unité {name} von Valancius et ses services rendus à l'Adeptus Mechanicus, je propose... une demande de clémence spéciale pour l'unité Jae Heydari. La condamnation à l'oubli sans servitorisation que lui valent ses crimes peut être commuée en une Servitude Imperpituis immédiate. »
languages.original_text: {n}After a long silence, Pasqal finally declares,{/n} "Given the high status of the unit {name} von Valancius and {mf|his|her} services rendered to the Adeptus Mechanicus, perhaps a request for... special leniency for the unit Jae Heydari. The sentence of oblivion without servitorisation that is stipulated for her crimes may instead be commuted to immediate redemptive Servitude Imperpituis."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après un long silence, Pasqal déclare enfin :{/n} « Considérant le rang élevé de l'unité {name} von Valancius et ses services rendus à l'Adeptus Mechanicus, je propose... une demande de clémence spéciale pour l'unité Jae Heydari. La condamnation à l'oubli sans servitorisation que lui valent ses crimes peut être commuée en une Servitude Imperpituis immédiate. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nach einer langen Pause verkündet Pasqal schließlich:{/n} "Angesichts des hohen Status der Einheit {name} von Valancius und der Dienste, die sie für den Adeptus Mechanicus erbracht hat, vielleicht ein Antrag auf ... spezielle Gnade für die Einheit Jae Heydari. Die Strafe des ewigen Nichts ohne Servitorisierung, die für ihre Verbrechen vorgeschrieben ist, kann stattdessen vielleicht in die sofortige Servitut Imperpituis zu Bußezwecken umgewandelt werden."
languages.original_text: {n}After a long silence, Pasqal finally declares,{/n} "Given the high status of the unit {name} von Valancius and {mf|his|her} services rendered to the Adeptus Mechanicus, perhaps a request for... special leniency for the unit Jae Heydari. The sentence of oblivion without servitorisation that is stipulated for her crimes may instead be commuted to immediate redemptive Servitude Imperpituis."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer langen Pause verkündet Pasqal schließlich:{/n} "Angesichts des hohen Status der Einheit {name} von Valancius und der Dienste, die sie für den Adeptus Mechanicus erbracht hat, vielleicht ein Antrag auf ... spezielle Gnade für die Einheit Jae Heydari. Die Strafe des ewigen Nichts ohne Servitorisierung, die für ihre Verbrechen vorgeschrieben ist, kann stattdessen vielleicht in die sofortige Servitut Imperpituis zu Bußezwecken umgewandelt werden."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}After a long silence, Pasqal finally declares,{/n} "Given the high status of the unit  von Valancius and {mf|his|her} services rendered to the Adeptus Mechanicus, perhaps a request for... special leniency for the unit Jae Heydari. The sentence of oblivion without servitorisation that is stipulated for her crimes may instead be commuted to immediate redemptive Servitude Imperpituis."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, uzun bir sessizliğin ardından beyanını dile getiriyor.{/n} "{name} von Valancius biriminin yüksek statüsü ve Adeptus Mechanicus için icra ettiği hizmetler değerlendirildiğinde, belki de Jae Heydari birimine müsamaha gösterilmesi talep edilebilir. Suçlarına karşılık hizmetörleştirilmeden ortadan kaldırılma cezası alması öngörülüyor. Bu ceza, anında kurtuluş müjdeli Müebbet Hizmet mahkûmiyetine dönüştürülebilir."
languages.original_text: {n}After a long silence, Pasqal finally declares,{/n} "Given the high status of the unit {name} von Valancius and {mf|his|her} services rendered to the Adeptus Mechanicus, perhaps a request for... special leniency for the unit Jae Heydari. The sentence of oblivion without servitorisation that is stipulated for her crimes may instead be commuted to immediate redemptive Servitude Imperpituis."

traits.locale_text: {n}Uzun bir sessizlikten sonra Pasqal sonunda beyanını dile getiriyor.{/n} "{name} von Valancius biriminin yüksek statüsü ve Adeptus Mechanicus için icra ettiği hizmetler değerlendirildiğinde, belki de Jae Heydari birimi için bir müsamaha talep edilebilir. Suçlarına karşılık olarak hizmetörleştirilmeden ortadan kaldırılma cezası alması öngörülmekte ve belki de bu ceza, anında Müebbet Hizmet'e mahkûm edilmesi durumuna dönüştürülebilir."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
